title: White House Plans To Mark Off World's Largest Ocean Sanctuary
teaser: The White House is announcing the creation of the world's largest marine sanctuary. The plan would make large sections of the Pacific Ocean off limits to fishing and energy exploration. The boundaries will be set after the White House consults with fishermen, scientists and other stakeholders
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
